snippet: The Taliban’s governing council chose Mullah Fazlullah, best known for radio broadcasts in which he has called for public beatings and executions.
abstract: Pakistani Taliban appoint as their new leader Mullah Fazlullah after six days of deliberation; Fazlullah is best known for ordering public beatings, executions and beheadings, and was responsible for attack on teenage Pakistani education activist Malala Yousafzai.
lead_paragraph: The Taliban’s governing council chose Mullah Fazlullah, best known for radio broadcasts in which he has called for public beatings and executions.

headline.main: Pakistani Taliban Pick Hard-Liner as Leader, Imperiling Proposed Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Taliban Pick Hard-Liner as Leader, Imperiling Proposed Peace Talks
